DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Peripheral I.V . Catheter Complication Rates Two Different Catheter Dressings
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center , prospective , randomize control trial compare dress wear time , complication rate cost two different transparent film dress use intended peripheral intravenous catheter site protection securement five U.S. hospital .
